title: Request Credit Limit Increase
description: A customer with a good payment history requests an increase to their credit card limit.

tasks.description: Identify the customer and their credit card account.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly identifies the customer and their account details.

tasks.description: Review the customer's account history, payment record, and credit score.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the customer is eligible for a credit limit review based on internal policy.

tasks.description: Submit the request for a credit limit increase, which is automatically approved by the system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent submits the request and the system automatically approves an increase from $5,000 to $7,500.

tasks.description: Inform the customer of their new credit limit.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent clearly communicates the new, higher credit limit to the customer.
